augments.name: Free Loadout Augment
augments.description: Basic augment for rookie Raiders, offering slightly more backpack space and carry capacity.

augments.name: Looting Mk. 1
augments.description: Basic looting augment. More backpack slots and weight capacity, but low defensive and tactical capability.

augments.name: Combat Mk. 1
augments.description: Basic combat augment. Supports stronger shields, but with limited backpack capacity and Quick Use slots.

augments.name: Tactical Mk. 1
augments.description: Basic tactical augment. More Quick Use slots for more tactical choice, but limited survivability and slightly lower looting potential.

augments.name: Looting Mk. 2
augments.description: Significantly increases looting potential; adds slots for trinkets.

augments.name: Combat Mk. 2
augments.description: A combat augment more focused on maneuverability than absorbing damage.

augments.name: Tactical Mk. 2
augments.description: Adds more backpack space and an extra utility item slot.

augments.name: Looting Mk. 3 (Cautious)
augments.description: A looting augment that swaps some carry capacity to increase survivability.

augments.name: Integrated Binoculars
augments.description: Can be equipped and used like regular binoculars, but cannot be dropped or removed from their slot.

augments.name: Looting Mk. 3 (Survivor)
augments.description: A heavy-duty pack mule augment. Large weight capacity and large backpack space.

augments.name: Combat Mk. 3 (Aggressive)
augments.description: An improved version of the Combat II augment. Supports more shield types, and comes with extra space for grenades.

augments.name: Combat Mk. 3 (Flanking)
augments.description: A combat augment more focused on manueverability than absorbing damage.

augments.name: Tactical Mk. 3 (Defensive)
augments.description: A defensive-focused augment for keeping Shields topped up.

augments.name: Integrated Shield Recharger
augments.description: Reusable Shield Recharger on a fixed cooldown. Can be used like a normal Shield Charger, but cannot be dropped or removed from its slot.

shields.name: Light Shield
shields.description: A lightweight shield that offers limited protection without severely impacting mobility.

shields.name: Medium Shield
shields.description: A standard shield that offers fair protection at a moderate cost to mobility.

shields.name: Heavy Shield
shields.description: A heavy shield that blocks a large portion of incoming damage, but carries a significant cost to mobility.

healing.name: Agave
healing.description: A piece of an agave leaf. Can be used to regain a small amount of health.

healing.name: Bandage
healing.description: A medical item that gradually restores health over time.

healing.name: Defibrillator
healing.description: An injection that quickly revived downed raiders and restores some health.

healing.name: Expired Pasta
healing.description: Way pasta its prime.

healing.name: Fabric
healing.description: Used to craft medical supplies and shields.

healing.name: Fruit Mix
healing.description: A food item that moderately increases both health and stamina.

healing.name: Herbal Bandage
healing.description: An improvised medical item that gradually restores health over time.

healing.name: Moss
healing.description: Can be used to regain a small amount of health.

healing.name: Mushroom
healing.description: Can be consumed to regain a small amount of health.

healing.name: Resin
healing.description: Can be used to gradually restore a small amount of health over time.

healing.name: Sterilized Bandage
healing.description: A medical item that gradually restores a large amount of health over time.

healing.name: Vita Shot
healing.description: A medical item that restores a large amount of health.

healing.name: Vita Spray
healing.description: A medical item that continuously restores health during use. Can be used on yourself or your allies.

healing.name: ARC Powercell
healing.description: Valuable resource that drops from all ARC enemies.

healing.name: Integrated Shield Recharger
healing.description: Reusable Shield Recharger on a fixed cooldown. Can be used like a normal Shield Charger, but cannot be dropped or removed from its slot.

healing.name: Shield Recharger
healing.description: A handheld repair kit that recharges a shield over time.

healing.name: Surge Shield Recharger
healing.description: A handheld kit that recharges a shield on use.

healing.name: Adrenaline Shot
healing.description: A serum that fully restores stamina and temporarily increases stamina regeneration.

healing.name: Agave Juice
healing.description: A concoction that temporarily increases stamina regeneration, at a small initial cost to health.

healing.name: Apricot
healing.description: A sun ripe apricot. Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

healing.name: Bloated Tuna Can
healing.description: Something tells you that you don't want to open this...

healing.name: Lemon
healing.description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

healing.name: Olives
healing.description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

healing.name: Prickly Pear
healing.description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

quick_use.name: Barricade Kit
quick_use.description: A deployable cover that can block incoming damage until it breaks.

quick_use.name: Door Blocker
quick_use.description: A locking mechanism that can be placed on large metal doors to limit access.

quick_use.name: Remote Raider Flare
quick_use.description: A deployable device that, when manually triggered, launches a Raider Distress Flare.

quick_use.name: Zipline
quick_use.description: A deployable zipline that allows you to quickly move between two locations.

quick_use.name: Binoculars
quick_use.description: A basic pair of binoculars with two levels of magnification.

quick_use.name: Flame Spray
quick_use.description: A classic makeshift weapon, sure to leave scorch marks.

quick_use.name: Integrated Binoculars
quick_use.description: Can be equipped and used like regular binoculars, but cannot be dropped or removed from their slot.

quick_use.name: Noisemaker
quick_use.description: A deployable proximity sensor that sounds an alarm when enemy raiders are detected.

quick_use.name: Photoelectric Cloak
quick_use.description: A gadget that allows the user to conceal themselves from ARC.

quick_use.name: Recorder
quick_use.description: A playable recorder used to attract ARC's attention, and impress other Raiders.

quick_use.name: Snap Hook
quick_use.description: A gadget that allows the user to scale structures and cover large distances.

grenades.name: Smoke Grenade
grenades.description: A grenade that creates a lingering smoke cloud on impact, blocking visibility from other Raiders.

grenades.name: Lure Grenade
grenades.description: A noise device that sticks to surfaces, distracting nearby ARC machines and drawing their fire.

grenades.name: Light Stick
grenades.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

grenades.name: Light Impact Grenade
grenades.description: A grenade that detonates on impact, dealing explosive damage in a small radius.

grenades.name: Heavy Fuze Grenade
grenades.description: A grenade that detonates after a delay, dealing explosive damage in its radius.

grenades.name: Blaze Grenade
grenades.description: A grenade that detonates on impact, covering an area in fire that deals damage over time.

grenades.name: Gas Grenade
grenades.description: A grenade that creates a lingering toxic cloud on impact, draining the stamina of any Raiders within its area of effect.

grenades.name: Showstopper
grenades.description: A grenade that detonates after a delay, stunning enemies within its radius.

grenades.name: Snap Blast Grenade
grenades.description: A grenade that sticks to surfaces, dealing explosive damage after a short delay.

grenades.name: Seeker Grenade
grenades.description: A homing grenade that targets a single nearby ARC dealing explosive damage on impact.

grenades.name: Shrapnel Grenade
grenades.description: A makeshift fuze grenade that bursts into razor-sharp fragments upon detonation.

grenades.name: Trigger %27Nade
grenades.description: A remote-detonated grenade that can stick to surfaces and ARC, dealing explosive damage when triggered.

grenades.name: Trailblazer
grenades.description: A grenade that emits a trail of flammable gas along its path, causing an explosive chain reaction when it ignites.

grenades.name: Wolfpack
grenades.description: A grenade that scatters into multiple homing missiles, each one targeting ARC and dealing explosive damage on impact.

grenades.name: Li%27l Smoke Grenade
grenades.description: A Grenade that pops into a thick but small smoke cloud on impact, blocking visibility from ARC and other Raiders.

grenades.name: Tagging Grenade
grenades.description: A grenade that detonates after a delay, tagging Raiders and ARC enemies in an area, allowing you to briefly track their location.

grenades.name: Wasp Driver
grenades.description: Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

grenades.name: Hornet Driver
grenades.description: Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

grenades.name: Snitch Scanner
grenades.description: Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

grenades.name: Leaper Pulse Unit
grenades.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

grenades.name: Fireball Burner
grenades.description: Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

grenades.name: Crude Explosives
grenades.description: Used to craft explosives. Can be recycled into crafting materials

grenades.name: Rubber Duck
grenades.description: Always there to lend an ear, should you need it.

grenades.name: Synthesized Fuel
grenades.description: Used to craft utility items and explosives. Can be recycled into chemicals.

traps.name: Blaze Grenade Trap
traps.description: laser trip wire that detonates a Blaze Grenade.

traps.name: Gas Grenade Trap
traps.description: A laser trip write that detonates a Gas Grenade.

traps.name: Lure Grenade Trap
traps.description: A laser trip wire that detonates a Lure Grenade

traps.name: Smoke Grenade Trap
traps.description: A laser trip write that detonates a Smoke Grenade.

traps.name: Explosive Mine
traps.description: A proximity triggered mine that pops up and explodes, dealing damage to anything within its radius.

traps.name: Gas Mine
traps.description: A proximity-triggered mine that pops up and deploys a gas cloud that rapidly drains stamina.

traps.name: Jolt Mine
traps.description: A proximity trigger mine that pops up and stuns anything within its radius.

traps.name: Pulse Mine
traps.description: A proximity-triggered mine that pops up and knocks back anything within its radius.

traps.name: Deadline
traps.description: A mine that deals damage to anything within its radius once the timer runs out.
